title: Fix my Matchmaking Algorithm
body: Stop matching me up with morons in ranked please , thanks

replies.body: Fix it yourself by getting good.
Look at my match history if you're so sure I can fix it

Just going to point this out.

Yasuo: 18 played, 44% win rate, 1.98 KDA (9 death average a game)
3 of your 7 most played champs are sub 50% win rates
You average 6 deaths in your last 20 games (and this is as an ADC/Jungle main.)
Your silver 3 and question why your playing with retards.
My most played 7 champs are 50% + win rate 2 of which are over 65%. with kda's of 2.5 + 3 of which with kda of 3+. and I still get match with people who have no where near the same stats.

So going to point out a couple of fundamental's.

Considering your most played champs, you having a 52% win rate overall, shows that your champion pool is too broad for your play (IE, you don't know how to play as many champs as you think you do).
You average 6 deaths in your last 20 games.
You probably play way too much well tilted given your match history and the fact that you've played so many ranked games.
Your MMR is Mid silver, your going to be playing with retards.
Your past 20 games win rate is misleading as well, as if we go by your past 40 games, you have a 40% win rate (16/24)
Yeh far out. Your defeat with zed two days ago was against two unranked players! Fix your sht riot, stop matching this guy against unskilled players
there is no fix to morons sadly, no matter how good, they are still there
